[[module css]]
.color3 .collapsible-block-folded a.collapsible-block-link{
    color: black;
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(
0deg, black 73.3%, red 73.3%);
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
}
.color3 .collapsible-block-unfolded-link a.collapsible-block-link{
    color: black;
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(
0deg, black 40%, red 60%);
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
    color: red;
}

[[/module]]

[[module css]]
.color a{
    color: green;
}
.color2 a {
    color: crimson;
}
.color4 a{
    color: maroon;
}
.color5 a{
    color: #952e31;
}
[[/module]]
author: Phylliidae
